text: (nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷē! Pōriliruntu veṟṟiyuṭaṉ) avarkaḷiṭam nīṅkaḷ tirumpa vantāl, nīṅkaḷ avarkaḷai(k kuṟṟam piṭikkātu) puṟakkaṇittu (viṭṭu)viṭa, avarkaḷ allāhviṉ mītu uṅkaḷ muṉ cattiyam ceyvārkaḷ. Ākavē, nīṅkaḷum avarkaḷai puṟakkaṇittu (viṭṭu)viṭuṅkaḷ. Niccayamāka avarkaḷ acuttamāṉavarkaḷ. Avarkaḷ cellumiṭam narakamtāṉ. (Atuvē) avarkaḷ ceytu koṇṭirunta (tīya) ceyalukkuriya taṇṭaṉaiyākum
